PHRASE.LANG: Saloons are always looking to get the best bar maids around. They'll give the best looking outfits to their bar maids so that they can get the most customers. Get this outfit and you will be sure to have the flashiest dress in town. This bundle includes: Bar Maid Outfit - Pink and Bar Maid Updo - Pink.[#Legal]

Les saloons recherchent toujours les meilleures serveuses dans le coin. Ils leur donnent les plus jolis costumes pour attirer un maximum de clients. Procurez-vous ce costume pour être sûre d'avoir la robe la plus voyante de la ville. Cet ensemble comprend : Costume de Serveuse - Rose et Coiffure de Serveuse - Rose. [#Legal]

Saloons sind immer bestrebt, die hübschesten Barmädchen zu haben. Sie werden ihren Barmädchen die schönsten Outfits geben, um die meisten Kunden anzulocken. Hole Dir dieses Outfit und du wirst sicher das auffälligste Kleid in der Stadt haben. Dieses Bundle enthält: Barmädchen Outfit - Rosa und Barmädchen Hochsteckfrisur - Rosa.[#Legal]

I Saloon sono sempre in cerca delle migliori bariste. Le vestono nel modo migliore per poter attirare più clienti. Prendi questo e sicuramente avrai il vestito più appariscente della città. Questo bundle include: Este paquete incluye: Il Completo della Barista – Rosa e Capelli Cotonati da Cameriera - Rosa. [#Legal]

Los Salones siempre intentan conseguir las mejores camareras y ponerles los mejores vestidos para atraer a más clientes.Póntelo y estarás segura de llevar el vestido más impactante del pueblo. Este paquete incluye: Traje de Camarera de Bar-Rosa y Recogido para Camarera – Rosa. [#Legal]

Saloons are always looking to get the best bar maids around. They'll give the best looking outfits to their bar maids so that they can get the most customers. Get this outfit and you will be sure to have the flashiest dress in town. This bundle includes: Bar Maid Outfit - Pink and Bar Maid Updo - Pink.[#Legal]
